bike.description: C10 super-light high-modulus carbon w/ internal shift cable routing, shaped oversized ride-tuned down tube, PF30 bottom bracket, tapered 1 1/8" - 1.5" head tube

components.description: C10 super-light high-modulus carbon seatstays w/ shaped ride-tuned chainstay, carbon 142x12mm dropout and replaceable hanger
Fox 32 FLOAT 29 Evolution CTD w/ remote lock out,15mm thru axle, tapered alloy steerer, 100mm travel
Shimano SLX, M675 hollow Tech II w/ integrated spindle, 38/24T
Shimano sealed cartridge
Shimano M616D, direct-mount
Shimano Deore XT, M781 SGS Shadow top normal, 10-speed
Shimano SLX, M670 Rapid Fire, 20/30-speed
Shimano Deore HG62, 11-36T, 10-speed
KMC X10, 10-speed
Formula CL-81 front / CL-142s rear 32H Center Lock disc hubs, Sun Inferno 25 rims
Schwable Nobby Nic, 29" x 2.25" folding, 67 tpi
Shimano Deore M615, hydraulic disc, 180/160mm rotor
Shimano Deore M615 hydraulic disc w/ Inspec
FSA 1 1/8" - 1.5", sealed cartridge bearings
Oval M650, alloy riser bar, 9° sweep, 31.8mm diameter, 710mm wide, +/- 5mm rise
Oval M713, 3D-forged alloy, 31.8mm clamp diameter, 6° rise
Oval dual-density Kraton, lock-on
Oval M400 w/ CrMo rails
Oval M750, alloy double-bolt micro-adjust, 31.6mm x 400mm
